data.title: OSX Fullscreen Issues
data.body: On OSX, choosing "fullscreen" seems to be a pseudo-fullscreen. The frame is not properly centered, resulting in a gap above the border on the top and no border on the bottom for the initial start-game menu. Unable to change between desktops (command + arrow) like with previous release. RA mod

data.title: [RA] Add 1-rank to paratroopers
data.body:
This is a minor version of what was originally proposed in #11066. This idea really fascinates me for some reason and it's worth bringing up again now if it has a chance to get implemented before the next release.

Having the paratroopers drop with 1-ranks would look really gorgeous. Balance wise it would make the drop _slightly_ stronger with the upgrades but given the current strength of the paradrop one would expect it to be regarded as an aesthetic finish more than anything else.

As an added easter-egg feature it would be really cool to have the paradrop upgrade to rank 2 with a spy in those fringe cases where a player gets control of both factions.

data.title: Fix the music resetting from time to time

milestone.title: release-20161015
milestone.description: Stability release with burning trees and video installation.

data.body:
Fixes #12024.

Reproduction case: Start a game with many AIs, heavy support and fastest game speed. Let it run a minute and then restart. Continue restarting until you notice the reset.

We didn't clear the `currentSounds` dictionary before, so the contents were carried over into a new world.

data.title: Add RA balance changes to the next playtest/release.

milestone.title: release-20161015
milestone.description: Stability release with burning trees and video installation.

data.body:
Partially following #12013 and in spirit of #11995 I'm probing a couple of balance changes aimed for the next playtest or directly to the next release. 

Paraphrasing selection of the list provided in #11995:

**Mammoth Tank:**

Speed 50, up from 42

As pointed to in the forum discussion thread (_not_ the recent poll thread) linked in the PR the speed buff is exactly what is expressed as the most crucial element as to making this unit useful for whatever purpose you want it assigned to. 

Initially the speed boost will reward casual players looking to invest in Mammoth Tanks for its iconic value. Long term this represents a foundation of which additional changes to the Mammoth Tank can be added, given that the current speed **fundamentally cripples** the tank both as an "utility" unit as well as a front line army unit.

**Camo. Pillbox:** 

Health: 450HP down from 600HP

The camo pillbox having cloak and at the same giving the same health/price value as the regular pillbox makes it too beefy and at the same time makes the regular pillbox more or less dormant. This is a very old observation made by a great majority of the community players. The camo. pillbox was super close to being merged in the RA mod as a french exclusive structure #11431. The idea behind it was to further distinguish France as a desceptive faction but also for the regular pillbox to make its way back into the game as a standard defensive structure. As per map playtesting the 450HP c.pillbox accomplished the latter and overall made competetive games a better experience.

**AA Missile Sub:** (**UPDATE**: Removed AAMissileSub commit from the PR.)

Cost: $2000, down from $2400
Damage: 25, down from 30
Added air as a valid target
Visual: Adjusted missile speed and height.

This is an old one but it's really bad that this hasn't made it's way into the game yet. Hamb first exposed this on his twitch a year ago and pretty much got a round of applause. This balance change more or less drowned in the balance discussions raging on before and after the 20151224 holiday release and pretty much remained dormant as focus went more over the fast evolving land battle meta (and naval maps slipping off the radar). However it was brought back in map playtesting from May and despite having limited exposure due to being a Soviet late tech naval unit it did deliver as prmoised - picking off lazy Hinds and Longbows over or close to water and damaging clusters of idling YAKs with the sudden burst of its submissiles. Plays well and fun as hell. The damage and cost was somewhat reduced to gain the unit a little more accessibility and the missile speed/trajectory altered slightly in order for the AA trajectory to look proper vs air.

Closes #11731

data.title: Give host a warning when he is about to close his own server
data.body:
some hosts dont understand ... that they are closing the game for everyone ... when they quit 

a warning would be nice ... having to "double"-accept when quitting a hosted game ... as host-player 

(this of course isnt an issue when having a dedicated server running)

data.title: Crash when trying to open replays

milestone.title: release-20161015
milestone.description: Stability release with burning trees and video installation.

data.body:
Hey, 
I was at http://www.gamereplays.org and tried to open the replay file with OpenRA.
(with firefox from the temp location directory)
Then it crashed due to no rights to access that file.

![openopenra replay crash](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5147014/18553689/ac16959c-7b61-11e6-99cd-8b7e14af1cc5.png)

(Note: 
- Opening OpenRa with a loaded replay streight from the normal replay directory works fine. 
- Even, if I don't have the fitting map, I'll get an "incompatible replay" message.
  
  )

milestone.title: release-20161015
milestone.description: Stability release with burning trees and video installation.

data.body: #11957 has the side-effect that you can no longer use enter to close the expanded chat overlay.  This is a minor but annoying regression.  We could assign enter as the cancel hotkey in that situation.

data.title: D2K - Missions lack of Harvester Reinforcements for Player
data.body:
In original D2K's missions if you are out of harvester you get a new one with carryall. This is coded into original missions, but abcdefg30 looks like missed them on OpenRA. Reinforcement waypoints can be looked from original missions.

I can take a look to it when i back to home tomorrow or anyone else can do it now as it sounds easy to fix.

data.title: OpenRA won't start or crash
data.body:
It's happens when dwm.exe (Windows service) is disabled. When I start it manually - all works fine. Crash when full-screen and won't start in pseudo-fullscren and windowed mode.

I have this situation with Intel GMA x3100 under Windows 7 Home Basic. And I want to disable dwm service with OS general performance reason (this service no need on Home Basic).

Unfortunately, I can't give my graphic.log because it's standalone computer without Net. But I am sure that you can repeat this bogus on any Windows installation (with dwm service of course).

data.title: Music reset issue on playtest

milestone.title: release-20161015

data.body: The music will reset randomly in the game whether you are playing or spectating. It seems to be causing it when the airstrikes or other ion/nukes are being used which has those notifications missing as well.

data.title: Remove duplicated "Prerequisites: ~disabled" fields from the TD campaign
data.body: `LST`s are already [disabled by default](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/blob/bleed/mods/cnc/rules/ships.yaml#L47) and [`C17`s](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/blob/bleed/mods/cnc/rules/aircraft.yaml#L166) are not buildable at all.

data.title: Utility --check-yaml fails in Bleed for any Mod

milestone.title: release-20161015
milestone.description: Stability release with burning trees and video installation.

data.body:
Example:

```
mono --debug OpenRA.Utility.exe ts --check-yaml /path/to/file.oramap

OpenRA.Utility(1,1): Error: Failed with exception: System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Unable to find parent package for /path/to/file.oramap
  at OpenRA.FileSystem.ZipFile..ctor (IReadOnlyFileSystem context, System.String filename) [0x0008a] in /home/servers/servers/tmp/bleed/OpenRA.Game/FileSystem/ZipFile.cs:65 
  at OpenRA.FileSystem.FileSystem.OpenPackage (System.String filename) [0x00050] in /home/servers/servers/tmp/bleed/OpenRA.Game/FileSystem/FileSystem.cs:52 
  at OpenRA.Mods.Common.UtilityCommands.CheckYaml.OpenRA.IUtilityCommand.Run (OpenRA.Utility utility, System.String[] args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

```

Example of uploaded maps:
http://resource.openra.net/maps/16189/
http://resource.openra.net/maps/15973/
